entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Collingwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Collingwood 06:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Temperature: 2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 77 %
Dewpoint: -1.2°C
Wind: NW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this morning. High plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or freezing rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then freezing rain or rain changing to rain late in the morning. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
